channel.title: Earnings Estimate on FinanClub

item.title: RIVN
item.description: score:759 Chances: Rivian Automotive is experiencing favorable earnings estimate revisions and has a positive Zacks Earnings ESP heading into earnings season. The International Energy Agency predicts a significant increase in electric vehicle sales, which could benefit companies like Rivian. Risks: Shares of Rivian, along with other EV hopefuls, fell in response to caution sparked by price cuts and competition in the electric vehicle market.
